sn55.48:1.2: Ekamantam nisinnam kho bhaddiyam sakkam bhagava etadavoca:
sn55.48:1.3: “catuhi kho, bhaddiya, dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano.
sn55.48:2.5: ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.48:2.6: Imehi kho, bhaddiya, catuhi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano”ti.
